rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with built-in storage and decorative elements adhering to Vastu principles, positioned in the north.
Spacious living room with large windows for natural light, designed as a central hub for family interactions. Vastu alignment: east.
Dining area adjoining the living room, with ample seating and natural light. Vastu alignment: southeast.
Modern kitchen designed for efficient workflow, with adequate ventilation and natural light. Vastu alignment: west.
Service space for washing, storage of cleaning materials; small windows for light. Vastu alignment: northwest.

openings.description: Grand entrance door leading to the living area with a vestibule for privacy.
Multiple windows installed in the east and south walls of the living room to maximize natural light and cross ventilation.
Large window overlooking the garden for ample daylight.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony and integrated dressing area, ensuring privacy and natural light. Vastu alignment: northeast.
Guest bedroom with a large window for natural ventilation and light. Vastu alignment: southeast.
Additional bedroom designed for flexibility with good ventilation. Vastu alignment: southwest.
Extra bedroom that can serve as a study or home office with abundant natural light. Vastu alignment: west.
Flexible space bedroom designed for personal relaxation or as a guest room with natural ventilation. Vastu alignment: northwest.
Dedicated private gym space equipped with modern fitness equipment and adequate natural ventilation. Vastu alignment: northeast.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the two floors with ample headroom and natural light.
Balcony access opening for master bedroom ensuring outdoor exposure.
